### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);


CREATE TABLE dashboards (
    dashboard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dashboard_name VARCHAR(255),
    dashboard_type VARCHAR(50),
    dashboard_owner VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);


CREATE TABLE data_visualizations (
    visualization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    visualization_name VARCHAR(255),
    visualization_type VARCHAR(50),
    visualization_data JSONB,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE reports SET report_name = 'New Report Name' WHERE report_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Reports (
 report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 report_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 report_date DATE,
 data_source VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Dashboards (
 dashboard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 dashboard_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 owner_id INT,
 creation_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
 user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
 email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
 role VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE DataSources (
 data_source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 source_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 connection_string TEXT,
 data_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Visualizations (
 viz_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 viz_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 viz_type VARCHAR(50),
 data_source_id INT
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Reports SET report_name = 'New Report Name' WHERE report_id = 1;
